feed.title: Mattermost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.1.4
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.1.4 contains medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.2.1
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.2.1 contains medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.3.1
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.3.1 contains various new improvements and bug fixes, including Scheduled Messages.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.1.5
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.1.5 fixes an issue where System Administrators could not pull posts in from Direct Message channels they were not in.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.1.6
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 10.1.6 restores System Administrator access to Direct and Group Messages without being a member.
